text:
Aww yeah! Today we're learning English with 
The Matrix! In this lesson you will learn

lots of English vocabulary and expressions.
The Matrix is a science-fiction action movie

and is set in a dystopian future where humanity 
is unknowingly trapped in a simulated reality

created by machines to distract humans 
and use their bodies as an energy source.

Now, before we get into today's lesson, 
we want to let you know that every week

we make lessons just like this one to help 
you learn fast English. Without getting lost,

without missing the jokes and without subtitles. 
Just like Aya, who says that she's learned more

in one month with our channel than in six 
months without it. So don't forget to hit

that Subscribe button and the Bell down below, 
so that you don't miss any of our new lessons.

Are you frustrated by finding it difficult to 
understand fast speaking natives? Then I highly

recommend our Fluent with Friends course. In this 
48-week course you will learn with the first two

seasons of Friends. Each week you'll receive PDF 
power lessons, vocabulary memorization software,

access to our Fluency Circle Global Community 
and so much more! And the best part is you can

try it right now for FREE with our 3-Part 
Masterclass! All you have to do is click up

here or in the description box below to learn 
more and sign up. Now we hope to see you there.

If you're a fan of learning English with 
movies, then why not check out our playlist?

You can take a look by clicking up 
here or in the description box below,

so that you can choose your next lesson 
to watchm straight after this one.

I want to make you a list of my 
favorite movies that I've seen

over the last year that will be great 
for you to learn English. Well now,

these are not just movies that came out 
over the last year. Rather they're all

ones that I have seen recently and that I 
think are great for learning the language.
